summary: BuildRequest asked for deployment-only go-live with no functionality/UI changes. The diff shows modifications to the Motoko backend file that appear to introduce/contain application feature logic (e.g., follow system, posts/comments/reactions/notifications maps and types), and a change to project_state.json tracking a new feature request, which were not requested as part of a deployment-only publish.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend social features and related data structures (e.g., follow system, friend requests, posts/comments/reactions/notifications types and persistent maps) present in backend/main.mo.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints specify deployment-only with no application functionality changes; adding or modifying such feature logic is out of scope for publishing.

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking/state update recording a new feature request entry for the go-live release (project_state.json new_feature_requests).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request changes to project state metadata; it requested deployment-only and explicitly listed 'Requirements: none'.
